sentences.english: When the iris is inflamed, it is likely that the ciliary body and choroid are involved too.
sentences.chinese: 當虹膜是發炎，很可能睫狀體和脈絡膜都參與過。

sentences.english: Sometimes you also get a yellow circle around the iris.
sentences.chinese: 有時，你的虹膜周圍還會有黃圈。

sentences.english: The main postoperative complications were anterior uveitis and posterior synechia of the iris.
sentences.chinese: 術後主要併發症是前葡萄膜炎和虹膜後粘連。

sentences.english: The opening of the iris is called the pupil.
sentences.chinese: 虹膜的開口處叫做瞳孔。

sentences.english: Two-value iris template will be achieved by compare every point of convolve image with zero.
sentences.chinese: 對虹膜區域進行二值化編碼，獲得虹膜特徵模板。

sentences.english: Two-value iris template will be achieved by compare every point of convolve image with zero.
sentences.chinese: 對虹膜區域進行二值化編碼，獲得虹膜特徵模板。

sentences.english: Iris scanning, on the other hand, works from a distance.
sentences.chinese: 虹膜掃描則可以在一定的距離之外操作。

sentences.english: Defects along inner margins of the iris may be from surgical correction for glaucoma.
sentences.chinese: 青光眼手術矯正會引起虹膜內緣缺陷。

sentences.english: We have investigated 47 patients with 78 eyes operated by peripheral iridectomy.
sentences.chinese: 隨訪觀察近五年虹膜周邊切除術病人47例78眼。

sentences.english: Methods The irides in 26 injury eyes were examined with ultrasound on coronary plane.
sentences.chinese: 方法對26只傷眼虹膜進行超聲冠狀平面掃查。

sentences.english: A novel and adaptive iris recognition method is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種新穎的自適應虹膜識別方法。

sentences.english: The main postoperative complications included corneal edema and iritis.
sentences.chinese: 併發症主要是角膜水腫及虹膜炎。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the operation time and scheme of repair.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討虹膜根部斷離修復術的時機和手術方法。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of black diaphragm intraocular lens implantation in the management of aphakia with traumatic aniridia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討眼外傷後無虹膜無晶狀體眼的治療方法。

sentences.english: The iris of the eye is photographed from up to one meter away.
sentences.chinese: 眼睛的虹膜最遠可在一公尺外的距離接受攝影。

sentences.english: The goddess Hera is attended by her handmaiden Iris.
sentences.chinese: 女神赫拉是出席由她的婢女虹膜。

definition: fingerprint/the arches, loops and whorls on the fingers
choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
ommatidium (single component of insect's compound eye)/one eye (i.e. one's left or right eye)
optic disk (terminal of the optic nerve on the retina)
fovea centralis (depression in the macula retina, most sensitive optic region)
